label: TTAnimal
comment: A Track and Trace (TT) animal or a group of animals, such as those kept or raised on a farm, ranch.

datatypeProperties.comment: The holder responsible party for this TT animal.
A location related to this TT animal.
A group of animals dealt with together.
A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the identity of an animal or a batch of animals.
Information about an animal which uniquely identifies it.
A Track and Trace (TT) animal, such as one kept or raised on a farm, ranch.
The species of a Track and Trace (TT) animal or batch of animals.

referencedBy.comment: A TT (Track and Trace) animal, such as one kept or raised on a farm or ranch, related to this trade product.
